New Records: Sri Lanka holds a 1-0 lead in the series after their victory in the second ODI
Key Match Events: The match is the third and deciding ODI; a win for Sri Lanka would mark their first bilateral ODI series triumph over India in 27 years
Pre-Game Insights: The pitch at R Premadasa Stadium has been spin-friendly, aiding Sri Lanka's bowlers; India's batting struggles against Sri Lanka's spin attack
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average first-inning score at the venue could be challenging to chase; historical context of Sri Lanka's victory
